item.title: Report X-2025010670
item.description:
Report X-2025010670

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-14
  • City: LINDEN
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF Freight
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ABF was at a customer location and the customer's forklift operator was loading freight onto the ABF trailer. The customer's forklift operator punctured a 5 gallon pail of Class 3 nail polish causing a release of roughly 2 gallons to the floor of the trailer. Safety advised the driver stay with the spill and that CURA would be contacted to send a crew out to clean the spill. ~~Called CURA and spoke with Candice advising the pro is not yet billed so we do not currently have a BOL or proper shipping name and asked that the crew advise on UN# involved when able. ~~~CURA sent out an update stating FCE crews arrived and assessed the site. Crews located two (2) 5 gallon pails of UN1263 nail polish and estimated a release of approximately ten (10) gallons.
